a.t-attf-class: header__menu-item header__menu-item list-menu__item link link--text focus-inset #{'active' if c.id == category.id else ''}

t.t-value: [sort for sort in website_sale_sortable if sort[1]==request.params.get('order', '')]

ul.class: grid grid--2-col negative-margin product-grid grid--3-col-tablet grid--one-third-max grid--4-col-desktop grid--quarter-max

t.t-value: keep(product.website_url, page=(pager['page']['num'] if pager['page']['num']>1 else None))
